leg.transformationDescription:
As the new fur on [npc.her] calves grows even longer, [npc.her] toes suddenly push together, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a cry as a thick, hoof-like nail grows in their place, before quickly transforming to turn [npc.her] feet into horse-like hoofs. As the transformation ends, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] that [npc.her] new hair smoothly transitions into the [npc.skin] covering the rest of [npc.her] body at [npc.her] upper-thigh.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] anthropomorphic, [style.boldHorseMorph(clydesdale-like legs and hoofed feet)], which have feathering on the calves and are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
